verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about, when<WH3588> men<WH120> began<WH2490> to multiply<WH7231> on the face<WH6440> of the land,<WH127> and daughters<WH1323> were born<WH3205> to them,

that the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that the daughters<WH1323> of men<WH120> were beautiful;<WH2896> and they took<WH3947> wives<WH802> for themselves, whomever<WH3605> <WH834> they chose.<WH977>

Then the Lord<WH3068> said,<WH559> "My Spirit<WH7307> shall not strive<WH1777> with man<WH120> forever,<WH5769> because<WH7683> he also<WH7683> is flesh;<WH1320> nevertheless his days<WH3117> shall be one hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> years.<WH8141>"

The Nephilim<WH5303> were on the earth<WH776> in those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> and also<WH1571> afterward,<WH310> <WH3651> when<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> came<WH935> in to the daughters<WH1323> of men,<WH120> and they bore<WH3205> [children] to them. Those<WH1992> were the mighty<WH1368> men<WH1368> who<WH834> [were] of old,<WH5769> men<WH376> of renown.<WH8034>

Then the Lord<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that the wickedness<WH9567> of man<WH120> was great<WH7227> on the earth,<WH776> and that every<WH3605> intent<WH3336> of the thoughts<WH4284> of his heart<WH3820> was only<WH7534> evil<WH7451> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>
And the Lord<WH3068> was sorry<WH5162> that He had made<WH6213> man<WH120> on the earth,<WH776> and He was grieved<WH6087> in His heart.<WH3820>

And the Lord<WH3068> said,<WH559> "I will blot<WH4229> out man<WH120> whom<WH834> I have created<WH1254> from the face<WH6440> of the land,<WH127> from man<WH120> to animals<WH929> to creeping<WH7431> things<WH7431> and to birds<WH5775> of the sky;<WH8064> for I am<WH5162> sorry<WH5162> that I have made<WH6213> them."
But Noah<WH5146> found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in the eyes<WH5869> of the Lord.<WH3068>

These<WH428> are [the records of] the generations<WH8435> of Noah.<WH5146> Noah<WH5146> was a righteous<WH6662> man,<WH376> blameless<WH8549> in his time;<WH1755> Noah<WH5146> walked<WH1980> with God.<WH430>
And Noah<WH5146> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of three<WH7969> sons:<WH1121> Shem,<WH8035> Ham,<WH2526> and Japheth.<WH3315>
Now the earth<WH776> was corrupt<WH7843> in the sight<WH6440> of God,<WH430> and the earth<WH776> was filled<WH4390> with violence.<WH2555>
And God<WH430> looked<WH7200> on the earth,<WH776> and behold,<WH2009> it was corrupt;<WH7843> for all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> had corrupted<WH7843> their way<WH1870> upon the earth.<WH776>

Then God<WH430> said<WH559> to Noah,<WH5146> "The end<WH7093> of all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> has come<WH935> before<WH6440> Me; for the earth<WH776> is filled<WH4390> with violence<WH2555> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of them; and behold,<WH2009> I am about to destroy<WH7843> them with the earth.<WH776>

"Make<WH6213> for yourself an ark<WH8392> of gopher<WH1613> wood;<WH6086> you shall make<WH6213> the ark<WH8392> with rooms,<WH7064> and shall cover<WH9216> it inside<WH4480> <WH1004> and out with pitch.<WH9217>

"And this<WH2088> is how<WH834> you shall make<WH6213> it: the length<WH753> of the ark<WH8392> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> cubits,<WH520> its breadth<WH7341> fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and its height<WH6967> thirty<WH7970> cubits.<WH520>

"You shall make<WH6213> a window<WH9472> for the ark,<WH8392> and finish<WH3615> it to a cubit<WH520> from the top;<WH4605> and set<WH7760> the door<WH6607> of the ark<WH8392> in the side<WH6654> of it; you shall make<WH6213> it with lower,<WH8482> second,<WH8145> and third<WH7992> decks.

"And behold,<WH2009> I, even I am bringing<WH935> the flood<WH3999> of water<WH4325> upon the earth,<WH776> to destroy<WH7843> all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> in which<WH834> is the breath<WH7307> of life,<WH9132> from under<WH8478> heaven;<WH8064> everything<WH3605> that is on the earth<WH776> shall perish.<WH1478>
"But I will establish<WH6965> My covenant<WH1285> with you; and you shall enter<WH935> the ark<WH8392> â€“ you and your sons<WH1121> and your wife,<WH802> and your sons' wives<WH802> with you.

"And of every<WH3605> living<WH2416> thing<WH2416> of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> you shall bring<WH935> two<WH8147> of every<WH3605> [kind] into the ark,<WH8392> to keep<WH2421> [them] alive<WH2421> with you; they shall be male<WH2145> and female.<WH5347>

"Of the birds<WH5775> after their kind,<WH4327> and of the animals<WH929> after their kind,<WH4327> of every<WH3605> creeping<WH7431> thing<WH7431> of the ground<WH127> after its kind,<WH4327> two<WH8147> of every<WH3605> [kind] shall come<WH935> to you to keep<WH2421> [them] alive.<WH2421>

"And as for you, take<WH3947> for yourself some<WH4480> of all<WH3605> food<WH3978> which<WH834> is edible,<WH398> and gather<WH622> [it] to yourself; and it shall be for food<WH402> for you and for them."
Thus Noah<WH5146> did;<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that God<WH430> had commanded<WH6680> him, so<WH3651> he did.<WH6213>
